Definition at line 40 of file eol_component.h.

enum eolComponentTypes

This will create the components used for window construction. Similar in concept to a gtkWidget, but severely limited to the components needed in a game

Enumerator:
eolNullComponent 

this type is set by default

eolLabelComponent 
eolButtonComponent 
eolEntryComponent 
eolSliderComponent 
eolImageComponent 
eolActorComponent 
eolListComponent 

Definition at line 29 of file eol_component.h.

enum eolListTypes
Enumerator:
eolListLines 

items are drawn from top to bottom fit within bounding rect

eolListBlock 

items are drawn left to right, then top to bottom fit within bounding rect

eolListDock 

items are drawn left to right. fit within bounding rect

checks if a component has changed since last frame

eolTrue if the component has changed, eolFalse otherwise
